briefTitle: The Impact of Respiratory Training of DIBH Radiotherapy for Breast Cancer
officialTitle: The Impact of Patients' Daily Independent Breathing Training on the Accuracy and Side Effects of Deep Inspiratory Breath-Hold Radiotherapy for Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: The daily measured setup error values of the image-guided radiotherapy device during the patient's treatment process.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Breast Cancer Radiotherapy Patients
* A single breath-hold can last for more than 10 seconds

Exclusion Criteria:

* A single breath-hold can last for more than 10 seconds
